content.text: Ashley is a famous artist, she has a successful music career and is an activist on social and political issues. She gained popularity in 2015 and today, we will learn about her daily routine.
content.name: 5WlX

content.text: Ashley starts her day early, around 7:30 a.m. That is when she walks her dog around her neighborhood. While doing that, she makes a mental list of her intentions for the day.
content.name: 5WlX

content.text: At 8.30 a.m., she enjoys a varied training routine. When she finishes, Ashley takes a shower, drinks a cup of tea and starts with rehearsals.
content.name: 5WlX

content.text: During the afternoon, she goes home at 4:30 p.m. and looks for a way to spend time with her loved ones. It is important for her to spend time with family and friends. This could be face to face or in an online mode. Then, she cooks or orders food and eats. Finally, she practices gratitude. Ashley likes to read and meditate before she goes to sleep at 10 p.m.
content.name: 5WlX
